author: woohyeonHeo
body:
#### PR description:
We add code which emulates the logic of the trigger firmware for the ME0 detector.
##### Add ME0 Trigger object (ME0Stub) and its producer to CMSSW
- Algorithm for ME0 Trigger: <https://ohm.bu.edu/~apeck/notes/algorithm.html>
- The code is based on the existing python emulator (<https://github.com/andrewpeck/me0sf/tree/ntuple_segment/road/tb>)
  + Its structure is designed to keep the same structure of the python emulator

#### PR validation:

- The code format has applied with `scram build code-format` and tested with `scram build code-checks`
- The output of the CMSSW code and the python emulator is identical
![diff](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/be74bff6-0d5d-4259-870d-e8ae3e6fe611)
- The default process (e.g. reco, raw2digi, etc.) did not modified. Therefore, there is no change in running `runTheMatrix.py`
title: L1t me0
